title: Natural Language Understanding for Seamless Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to understand my voice commands accurately so that I can easily manage my daily tasks, stay connected with loved ones, and access information without frustration.

title: Voice Feedback and Confirmation
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide voice feedback and confirmation for my commands, so that I feel assured that my tasks are being executed correctly and can interact with the system confidently.

title: Contextual Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to manage my daily tasks and reminders easily so that I can stay organized and maintain my independence despite my reduced mobility.

title: Adaptive Voice Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to learn and adapt to my voice commands over time so that I can manage my daily tasks more easily and efficiently despite my mobility limitations.

title: Error Recovery and Help Guidance
summary: As an older adult, I want clear and simple guidance when I encounter errors or need assistance with ALFRED, so that I can continue using the system without frustration.

title: Multimodal Interaction Support
summary: As an older adult, I want to interact with ALFRED using both voice commands and simple touch controls so that I can manage my tasks and stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User Personalization Settings
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily customize my interaction preferences with ALFRED so that I can tailor the system to my specific needs and ensure it supports my lifestyle and activities effectively.

title: Integration with External Voice Services
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to interact with ALFRED through external voice services so that I can easily manage my daily tasks and stay connected with family and friends without needing to learn complex technology.
